content: I don’t think Shea has watched the Raptors since the All Star break, and he clearly hasn’t watched the Celtics. I’ll buy the Cavs as the scariest team in the East if you believe that they actually have another gear (I don’t, personally), but the Raptor’s defense is legit, and with Lowry back they should be heavy favorites against the Celtics in the second round if that matchup occurs, IMO.
